content: the original designer of banana socks is unknown here is the pattern i put together that works for average adult feet edit i noticed some of you made modifications and i liked them so i m including a list here 1 for toe increases use kfb instead of m1r/m1l easier 2 after the increases start with purl rounds instead of knit rounds looks prettier 3 change bottom stitches from k2-p2 to k- p2-k2 -k looks prettier thank you for your suggestions and happy knitting
